TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMetadata extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeMetadata abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供事件以解析 Windows 中繼資料檔案所提供的型別的僅限反映型別要求，以及執行解析的方法。

span.span: Provides an event for resolving reflection-only type requests for types that are provided by Windows Metadata files, and methods for performing the resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於.NET Framework 中，組件識別並不重要的[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]型別。Unlike the .NET Framework, assembly identity isn’t important for [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types. 在[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]，Windows 中繼資料檔案 (。WinMD 檔案） 包含僅中繼資料，不是程式碼。In the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)], Windows Metadata files (.WinMD files) contain only metadata, not code. 型別從一個 Windows 中繼資料檔案之間移動中的服務組件版本，所以找不到命名空間相關聯的 Windows 中繼資料檔案。Types can move from one Windows Metadata file to another in a service pack release, so it’s important to be able to locate the Windows Metadata files that are associated with a namespace. > [!NOTE] > 子命名空間不代表內含項目。Sub-namespaces don’t imply containment. 命名空間 A.B 也就是不包含在命名空間 a。That is, namespace A.B isn't contained in namespace A.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event DesignerNamespaceResolve As EventHandler(Of DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs)

summary.span: 在設計環境中 Windows 中繼資料檔的解析失敗時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a Windows Metadata file fails in the design environment.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve As EventHandler(Of NamespaceResolveEventArgs)

summary.span: 在反映專用內容中解析 Windows 中繼資料檔失敗時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a Windows Metadata file fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會引發和處理之後，它不會引發一次應用程式定義域的存留期間。After this event is raised and handled, it is not raised again for the lifetime of the application domain. 無法變更定義命名空間的檔案清單。The list of files that defines the namespace cannot be changed. 這個事件是類似於managed 組件的事件。This event is analogous to the event for managed assemblies. 請參閱 類別。See the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件的事件處理常式不應該擲回例外狀況。The event handler for this event should not throw exceptions.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 指定要搜尋的位置清單，尋找指定之命名空間的 Windows 中繼資料檔案。

span.span: Locates the Windows Metadata files for a specified namespace, given a list of locations to search.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> ResolveNamespace(string namespaceName, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> packageGraphFilePaths) cil managed
Public Shared Function ResolveNamespace (namespaceName As String, packageGraphFilePaths As IEnumerable(Of String)) As IEnumerable(Of String)

span.span: The namespace to resolve.

param.name: packageGraphFilePaths
param.span: 用於搜尋 Windows 中繼資料檔案的應用程式路徑，若為 則只搜尋作業系統安裝中的 Windows 中繼資料檔案。

span.span: The application paths to search for Windows Metadata files, or to search only for Windows Metadata files from the operating system installation.

summary.span: 指定要搜尋的位置，尋找指定之命名空間的 Windows 中繼資料檔案。

span.span: Locates the Windows Metadata files for the specified namespace, given the specified locations to search.

returns.span: 字串的可列舉清單，這些字串表示定義 的 Windows 中繼資料檔。

span.span: An enumerable list of strings that represent the Windows Metadata files that define .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定`null`如`windowsSdkFilePath`參數。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying `null` for the `windowsSdkFilePath` parameter.

exception.span: 本作業系統版本不支援 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]。

span.span: The operating system version does not support the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].
is .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> ResolveNamespace (string namespaceName, string windowsSdkFilePath, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> packageGraphFilePaths);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> ResolveNamespace(string namespaceName, string windowsSdkFilePath, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> packageGraphFilePaths) cil managed
Public Shared Function ResolveNamespace (namespaceName As String, windowsSdkFilePath As String, packageGraphFilePaths As IEnumerable(Of String)) As IEnumerable(Of String)

public: static System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::String ^> ^ ResolveNamespace(System::String ^ namespaceName, System::String ^ windowsSdkFilePath, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::String ^> ^ packageGraphFilePaths);

span.span: The namespace to resolve.

param.name: windowsSdkFilePath
param.span: 要搜尋 SDK 所提供的 Windows 中繼資料檔案的路徑，或者為（從作業系統安裝位置搜尋 Windows 中繼資料檔案）。

span.span: The path to search for Windows Metadata files provided by the SDK, or to search for Windows Metadata files from the operating system installation.

param.name: packageGraphFilePaths
param.span: 用於搜尋 Windows 中繼資料檔案的應用程式路徑。

span.span: The application paths to search for Windows Metadata files.

summary.span: 指定要搜尋的位置，尋找指定之命名空間的 Windows 中繼資料檔案。

span.span: Locates the Windows Metadata files for the specified namespace, given the specified locations to search.

returns.span: 字串的可列舉清單，這些字串表示定義 的 Windows 中繼資料檔。

span.span: An enumerable list of strings that represent the Windows Metadata files that define .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您為指定的路徑`windowsSdkFilePath`搜尋僅適用於 Windows 的開頭的命名空間。The path you specify for `windowsSdkFilePath` is searched only for namespaces that begin with Windows.

is .
